allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add tenant infrastructure: TenantMixin, TenantManager, middleware

Critical multi-tenant foundation with automatic query scoping:
- TenantManager filters ALL queries by current tenant \(prevents data leaks\)
- TenantMiddleware resolves tenant from header/subdomain/default
- Tenant, TenantSettings, TenantSequence models
- Auto-create settings and sequences on tenant creation
- Default tenant "Raven Distribution" for development

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Party models: Party, Customer, Vendor, Location, Truck

Phase 1 party module implementation:
- Party: Universal entity for customers/vendors with tenant scoping
- Customer: Customer-specific attributes \(OneToOne with Party\)
- Vendor: Vendor-specific attributes \(OneToOne with Party\)
- Location: Physical addresses with type \(ship_to, bill_to, warehouse, office\)
- Truck: Scheduling resource for deliveries

All models inherit from TenantMixin for automatic query scoping.
Full admin interface with inline editing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
